select i.INQUIRY_NUM inquiryNum, i.TITLE, ic.NAME category, i.CONTENTS from inquiry i, INQUIRY_CATEGORY ic where i.INQUIRY_CATEGORY_NUM=ic.INQUIRY_CATEGORY_NUM and INQUIRY_NUM='${inquiryNum}'
